featured.text: Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger was fully aware of the power of youth culture.
For example, proms organized by and for homeless youth were reported.
Marketers recognize this fact and often use elements of youth culture to promote their products.

other.text: Her incredible story and superior swimming Brazilian government and later continued judo skills won her the opportunity to participate in the training at a youth facility.
Rap's rise and sustained global popularity is a good illustration of how influential youth culture is on youth attitudes and behavior.
What is the best title for this passage? (A) The Importance of Marketing (B) The Power of Youth Culture (C) The Popularity of Hip-hop Fashion (D)

definition.zh_def: 年輕時期，通常指青少年或年輕人的階段。
definition.en_def: The period of being young, typically referring to teenagers or young adults.
definition.example: The youth of today are more aware of global issues than ever before.
